name: befittingly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is suitable or right for someone or something: Befittingly for a professor, she keeps a library of over 10,000 books in her home. At 5 feet 7 inches tall, my teacher, Mr Short, is befittingly named.
More examplesFewer examplesThe bride and groom met while performing in an orchestra, so befittingly, their first dance as husband and wife was to a song they had played together. He works as an electrician, and befittingly, he has a tattoo of a light bulb on his right bicep.
